cl.name: Rogue
cl.desc: agile and tricky, relying on precision and debilitating opponents

abs.name: Shiv
abs.desc: A quick, precise stab that deals 20 physical damage.

abs.name: Backstab
abs.desc: Strike a vital point and deal 35 points of physical damage.

abs.name: Focus
abs.desc: Take a moment to concentrate, restoring your mental energy. Restores 10 EP.

abs.name: Smoke Bomb
abs.desc: Throw a smoke bomb, making you harder to hit. You have a 50% chance of evading any incoming attacks in the current round.

abs.name: Sneak Attack
abs.desc: You rely on your agility to evade your opponent, taking no damage from any of their attacks, while you deal 45 physical damage to them.

charAbs.name: Shiv
charAbs.desc: A quick, precise stab that deals 20 physical damage.

charAbs.name: Focus
charAbs.desc: Take a moment to concentrate, restoring your mental energy. Restores 10 EP.

charAbs.name: Sneak Attack
charAbs.desc: You rely on your agility to evade your opponent, taking no damage from any of their attacks, while you deal 45 physical damage to them.

cl.name: Mage
cl.desc: command arcane energies, specializing in powerful spells and mystical manipulation

abs.name: Arcane Bolt
abs.desc: Launch a basic magical projectile that deals 20 arcane damage to the target.

abs.name: Arcane Blast
abs.desc: Unleash a burst of fiery energy, dealing 65 arcane damage to the target

abs.name: Mana Channel
abs.desc: Draw upon ambient magical energy to restore your own. Restores 15 EP.

abs.name: Lesser Heal
abs.desc: LWeave a minor healing spell to mend your wounds. Restores 40 HP.

abs.name: Arcane Shield
abs.desc: Conjure a protective barrier of mystical energy around yourself. You do not take any damage for the round

charAbs.name: Arcane Bolt
charAbs.desc: Launch a basic magical projectile that deals 20 arcane damage to the target.

charAbs.name: Arcane Blast
charAbs.desc: Unleash a burst of fiery energy, dealing 65 arcane damage to the target

charAbs.name: Mana Channel
charAbs.desc: Draw upon ambient magical energy to restore your own. Restores 15 EP.

charAbs.name: Defend
charAbs.desc: The character takes on a defensive stance and takes only half damage.

charAbs.name: Recharge
charAbs.desc: The character does nothing during the round but regains 5 EP.
